title: Indiabulls Housing Finance offers to buyback NCDs worth Rs 800 crore maturing by June 30 - Moneycontrol
content: Indiabulls Housing Finance offers to buyback NCDs worth Rs 800 crore maturing by June 30  Moneycontrol
description: If any NCD holder decides to sell their holdings on the exchange to the company under a negotiated trade, then they are required to "get in touch with company personnel" prior to June 28, an exchange filing noted.
